casebody.data:
[Cite as 04/25/2003 Case Announcements #2, 2003-Ohio-2095.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

April 25, 2003

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2003-0727. State ex rel. Wilkinson v. Reed.

In Prohibition. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of prohibition. Upon consideration of relators’ emergency motion for alternative writ of prohibition,

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that the time to file a response to the complaint under S.Ct.Prac.R. X(5) is shortened to 12 days from the date of this entry.
